sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE169010 SET YETA_0C29 = #yeta0c29# , YETA_C162 = #yetaC162# , YETA_C163 = #yetaC163# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE YE169010 SET YETA_C114 = #yetaC114# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.SETT_GBNM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SUBT_ETAX , AA.SUBT_INHB , AA.SUBT_FAFV , AA.SUBT_AMSU
FROM ( SELECT (1) AS SOT , ('결정세액') AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , DPOB_CD , NVL(YETA_C159,0) AS SUBT_ETAX , NVL(YETA_C160,0) AS SUBT_INHB , NVL(YETA_C161,0) AS SUBT_FAFV , ( NVL(YETA_C159 ,0) + NVL(YETA_C160 ,0) + NVL(YETA_C161 ,0) ) AS SUBT_AMSU
FROM YE169010
UNION ALL SELECT (2) AS SOT , ('기납부세액') AS SETT_GBNM , TA01.SYSTEMKEY , TA01.CLUT_SEPT_CD , TA01.YRTX_BLGG_YR , TA01.DPOB_CD , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_C162 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) ) AS ALDC_PIIT , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_C163 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) ) AS ALDC_PHBT , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_C164 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM ,0) ) AS ALFA_YVTA , ( (NVL(TA01.YETA_C162 ,0) + NVL(TA01.YETA_C163 ,0) + NVL(TA01.YETA_C164 ,0)) + (NVL(TA02.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM ,0)) ) AS ALDC_PHTO
FROM YE169010 TA01, ( SELECT EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD, EE.SYSTEMKEY, SUM (EE.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM) AS PRCSP_NNKS_SUM FROM YE160404 EE WHERE EE.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND EE.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY EE.SYSTEMKEY, EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD) TA02 WHERE TA01.DPOB_CD = TA02.DPOB_CD(+) AND TA01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = TA02.YRTX_BLGG_YR(+) AND TA01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = TA02.CLUT_SEPT_CD(+) AND TA01.SYSTEMKEY = TA02.SYSTEMKEY(+)
UNION ALL SELECT (3) AS SOT , ('차감징수세액') AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , DPOB_CD , NVL(YETA_C168,0) AS SUBT_ETAX , NVL(YETA_C169,0) AS SUBT_INHB , NVL(YETA_C170,0) AS SUBT_FAFV , ( NVL(YETA_C168 ,0) + NVL(YETA_C169 ,0) + NVL(YETA_C170 ,0) ) AS SUBT_AMSU
FROM YE169010
) AA
WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY AA.SOT ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.SETT_GBNM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SUBT_ETAX , AA.SUBT_INHB , AA.SUBT_FAFV , AA.SUBT_AMSU
FROM ( SELECT (1) AS SOT , ('결정세액') AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , DPOB_CD , NVL(YETA_C159,0) AS SUBT_ETAX , NVL(YETA_C160,0) AS SUBT_INHB , NVL(YETA_C161,0) AS SUBT_FAFV , ( NVL(YETA_C159,0) + NVL(YETA_C160,0) + NVL(YETA_C161,0) ) AS SUBT_AMSU
FROM YE169010
UNION ALL SELECT (2) AS SOT , ('기납부세액') AS SETT_GBNM , TA01.SYSTEMKEY , TA01.CLUT_SEPT_CD , TA01.YRTX_BLGG_YR , TA01.DPOB_CD , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_C162 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) ) AS ALDC_PIIT , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_C163 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) ) AS ALDC_PHBT , ( NVL(TA01.YETA_C164 ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM ,0) ) AS ALFA_YVTA , ( (NVL(TA01.YETA_C162 ,0) + NVL(TA01.YETA_C163 ,0) + NVL(TA01.YETA_C164 ,0)) + (NVL(TA02.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM ,0) + NVL(TA02.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM ,0)) ) AS ALDC_PHTO
FROM YE169010 TA01, ( SELECT EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD, EE.SYSTEMKEY, SUM (EE.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM) AS PRCSP_NNKS_SUM FROM YE160404 EE WHERE EE.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND EE.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY EE.SYSTEMKEY, EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD) TA02 WHERE TA01.DPOB_CD = TA02.DPOB_CD(+) AND TA01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = TA02.YRTX_BLGG_YR(+) AND TA01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = TA02.CLUT_SEPT_CD(+) AND TA01.SYSTEMKEY = TA02.SYSTEMKEY(+)
UNION ALL SELECT (3) AS SOT , ('차감징수세액') AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , DPOB_CD , NVL(YETA_C168 ,0) AS SUBT_ETAX , NVL(YETA_C169 ,0) AS SUBT_INHB , NVL(YETA_C170 ,0) AS SUBT_FAFV , ( NVL(YETA_C168 ,0) + NVL(YETA_C169 ,0) + NVL(YETA_C170 ,0) ) AS SUBT_AMSU
FROM YE169010
) AA
WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )
